column1: in memory of anna lois forrester lipford| first: last: born: july 31
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:hux-lipford funeral home. mountain city
column4: tn send card. anna lois forrester lipford. july 31
column10: tn passed away at her residence thursday
column12: 2015. she was the daughter of the late booker johnson and lura may johnson. lois was a member of walnut grove baptist church and she loved canning
column14: flowers and photography. in addition to her parents
column15: she was preceded in death by her husbands
column16: ottis forrester and ralph lipford; daughter sandy lipford; son allen lipford; brothers cecil and robert (bob) johnson; sister margaret glenn and an infant brother john. survivors include: four sons: james forrester and wife bet; kenny forrester; benny forrester and freddy forrester and wife diana
column18: tn; brother: james johnson and wife joyce of creston
column19: nc; sisters-in-law: mae johnson and betty johnson; nine grandchildren; 21 great grandchildren; stepson jerry lipford of mountain city
column20: tn; stepdaughter connie payne and husband larry of knoxville
column21: tn; step grandchildren: craig lipford and david payne; nieces jane clark and penny keller; and six nephews. special friends sandy glenn
column25: mai lynn royston and nancy wills also survive. funeral services for anna lois johnson forrester lipford will be conducted at 7:00 p. m. friday
column27: 2015 from charles b. hux memorial chapel of hux-lipford funeral home with rev. harry wills and rev. david bentley officiating. the family will receive friends from 5:00 7:00 p. m. prior to the funeral services. graveside and interment will be held in johnson lipford cemetery at 9:00 a. m. sunday
column29: 2015. active pallbearers will be matthew forrester
column35: gary johnson and william glenn. honorary pallbearers will be buford lipford
column37: lennie glenn and dr. donald walters. at other times friends may call at the residence
column40: tn. online condolences may be sent to the family through our website at www. huxlipfordfh. comprofessional arrangements for the lipford family are in the care of hux-lipford funeral home.
